about_the_game:
Let him in. The Bray Wyatt Edition Pack includes:
- The debut of a brand-new playable version of "The Fiend"
- Playable in-game Mattel Bray Wyatt action figure
- Updated Uncle Howdy character featuring Bo Dallas
- "The Fiend"-themed championship belt
- Firefly Funhouse MyFACTION* manager card
- 15,000 VC
*Online play including MyFACTION requires an internet connection and 2K Account. Terms apply.
detailed_description:
Let him in. The Bray Wyatt Edition Pack includes:
- The debut of a brand-new playable version of "The Fiend"
- Playable in-game Mattel Bray Wyatt action figure
- Updated Uncle Howdy character featuring Bo Dallas
- "The Fiend"-themed championship belt
- Firefly Funhouse MyFACTION* manager card
- 15,000 VC
*Online play including MyFACTION requires an internet connection and 2K Account. Terms apply.

short_description: Celebrate the memory of the beloved, enigmatic WWE Superstar Bray Wyatt with the WWE 2K24 Bray Wyatt Edition Pack. Featuring the debut of a brand-new playable version of "The Fiend" and much more. Let him in.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
